title: 3.1 Master Challenge 3
question:
Draw a big circle on a plain backdrop. Divide the circle into two and fill different colors in each half. Program a sprite to move inside the circles and stop when it reaches the middle.
Hint: When the sprite is in the middle, it will touch both the colors
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11
